descriptionHtml:
[color=#00ff00][size=5][color=#ff0000][size=3]***I have officially retired from modding Skyrim***[/size][/color]
[/size][/color]
[color=#00ff00][size=5][color=#ffffff][size=3]Well that's a half truth, I will no longer creating any new content, but since I since I'm very
much a user of mods I'll be on the nexus for years to come, so I'll
still be managing my mod pages[/size][/color]

Blaqk Horizon's Kvatch Ranger Armor[/size][/color]
created by Dahkar (a.k.a. Blaqk Horizon)

[color=#ff0000][size=4]Description[/size][/color]

The Kvatch Ranger Armor started out as personal mod, but after putting so much work into it I figured I would go all the way.

This mod adds a full set of light armor for both male and female characters.
Adds a new long sword

All items are craftable with the steel armor perk. The stats are similar to the elven weapons and armor, with the exception they weight more.
All light armor perks should work for this armor, but has not been tested

CBBE support will be available as an optional download

[color=#ff0000][size=4]FAQ[/size][/color]

Q: why pick the city of Kvatch?
A: Kvatch and Skingrad were my favorite cities for oblivion. This mod started out as just a shield replacer for my character, the armor and sword just kind of followed.

Q: Will this mod conflict with other mods?
A: All file paths, keywords and CK ids are unique; so there shouldn't be any conflicts
[color=#ff0000][size=4]
Permissions[/size][/color]

Don't upload this mod to other sites. Don't make mods using this mod.
If for some reason you really want to use an asset from this mod send me a message on the nexus and we will go from there.

[color=#ff0000][size=4]Credits[/size][/color]

All textures and meshes in my mod have been modified from Bethesda's original skyrim textures and meshes. No files from oblivion were use for this mod

The optional CBBE version of Kvatch Ranger Armor uses the female stormcloak armor from Calientes Vanilla Outfits for CBBE, Create By Caliente.

If you use CBBE body I would recommend downloading the whole vanilla replacer mod at [url=http://]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12273/?[/url]
author: Dahkar_aka Blaqk Horizon
